column5: K hello fellaz, im heading up to lake nipissing for a week with my mom my dad and my sister and i was looking for some tips on fishing the south shore im going for anything i can get carp,pike,bass,muskie anything would satisfy me at this point havnt been fishing since last year but my family and i love it!well thanks in advance! little angler  "Its all fun and games till someone looses a fish"
Go get em!  I've never fished that part of Nipissing, but the rest of the lake is still producing despite some serious pressure, so I'm sure you'll have some success.
